stories.text: I, like many people on HN, enjoy FOSS. Every now and then I like to just browse GitHub and see what I find, but I know there must still be thousands of repositories I haven't seen yet or that fall outside of my usual domain. What is a FOSS repository or codebase that, in your opinion, is significantly interesting/innovative/etc, but is also relatively unknown amongst the community?
stories.title: Ask HN: What is the most interesting FOSS that most people don't know about?
I don't work here but I optimized Netlify Web App
Amazon, Google, Microsoft Vie for Work on ICE RAVEn Data-Mining Tool

stories.text: In light of Apple and ProtonMail, I've been making changes to my tools to find better vendors. What are others out there finding? Any good meta sources or communities?
stories.title: Ask HN: Where do you go for good privacy tools?
